Names, Organizational
lead_paragraph: Senator Harry Reid, the majority leader, cited the N.B.A.’s example in calling on Commissioner Roger Goodell to take action to change the name of Washington’s football team.
snippet: Senator Harry Reid, the majority leader, cited the N.B.A.’s example in calling on Commissioner Roger Goodell to take action to change the name of Washington’s football team.
